title: Ne Win
summary: Ne Win (Burmese: နေဝင်း IPA: [nè wɪ́ɰ̃]; 10 July 1910, or 14 or 24 May 1911 – 5 December 2002) was a Burmese politician and military commander who served as Prime Minister of Burma from 1958 to 1960 and 1962 to 1974, and also President of Burma from 1962 to 1981.[2] Ne Win was Burma's military dictator during the Socialist Burma period of 1962 to 1988.[lower-alpha 1]
